Creator: SHOAL KOLEY
Description:
AddRoom API allows adding a room without authentication

Steps to Reproduce:

# Open Postman
# Send a POST request to:
[https://webapps.tekstac.com/HotelAPI/RoomService/addRoom|https://webapps.tekstac.com/HotelAPI/RoomService/addRoom]
# Use x-www-form-urlencoded body:
roomId=999
hotelId=H2001
roomType=SINGLE
roomStatus=AVAILABLE
roomPrice=2000
# Do not include any Authorization header
# Observe the response

Expected Result:

* API should return 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden
* Room should NOT be added without a valid access token

Actual Result:

* API returns 200 OK
* Room is successfully added even without authentication

Impact:

* Security vulnerability: Unauthorized users can add rooms
* Data integrity issue in Hotel Room Management

Creator: SHOAL KOLEY
Description:
DeleteRoomById API deletes rooms without authentication.

Steps to Reproduce:

# Open Postman
# Send a DELETE request to:
[https://webapps.tekstac.com/HotelAPI/RoomService/deleteRoomById/101|https://webapps.tekstac.com/HotelAPI/RoomService/deleteRoomById/101]
# Do not include any Authorization header
# Observe the response

Expected Result:

* API should return 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden
* Room should NOT be deleted without a valid access token

Actual Result:

* API returns 200 OK
* Room is deleted successfully without authentication

Impact:

* Critical security flaw: Any user can delete hotel room records
* Leads to data loss and system vulnerability

Creator: SHOAL KOLEY
Description:
UpdateRoomPrice API updates room prices without authentication.

Steps to Reproduce:

# Open Postman
# Send a PUT request to:
[https://webapps.tekstac.com/HotelAPI/RoomService/updateRoomPrice|https://webapps.tekstac.com/HotelAPI/RoomService/updateRoomPrice]
# Body (x-www-form-urlencoded):
roomId=301
roomPrice=2500
# Do not include any Authorization header
# Observe the response

Expected Result:

* API should return 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden
* Room price should NOT be updated without a valid access token

Actual Result:

* API returns 200 OK
* Room price is updated successfully without authentication

Impact:

* Security vulnerability: Anyone can update hotel room prices
* Data integrity risk in Hotel Room Management system
